full_text: Upon my return from Europe last week, I flew above this magnificent bridge across the #TamsuiRiver while descending. Decades of waiting make it shine. The #DanjiangBridge is no longer an imagination but a new memory for #NewTaipeiCity. I appreciate all the efforts for making it. https://t.co/c4yF8n7jEJ

I warmly welcomed @eu_eeas Amb. @LutzGuellner. #NewTaipeiCity & the #EU frequently interact, particularly in the energy & high-tech sectors. @NewTaipeiGov also joins @IURC_Programme. I encourage companies to diversify investments in the üá™üá∫ & not put all their eggs in one basket. https://t.co/hxKSDIoidc

Congratulations to teenage baseball players of New Taipei Municipal Er Chong Junior High School for winning first place in the 2025 U15 #BFA Asian Baseball Championship!

Fueled by the cheering from the Taiwanese audience, I know you were determined to keep the trophy at home. https://t.co/kQlVWuBSfR

It's a pleasure to host Amb. Ruth Bradley-Jones of @UKinTaiwan. @NewTaipeiGov & the #UK üá¨üáß are dedicated to building urban #resilience through disaster prevention & early warning systems. #Renewable energy & offshore wind power are critical for #Taiwan to collaborate with the UK. https://t.co/TH6vXf0dwE

Happy Father's Day!

A father is like a light, a shadow‚Äîalways there for his children.

Silently illuminating his children's path in life.

Guarding and accompanying them every step of the way. https://t.co/bmincKQWs1

After wasting NT$1.2 billion on a failed #recall campaign, the Lai administration's biggest "achievement" this year is a painful 20% #tariff.

The tariff rate is higher than our Asian neighbors'. How long will this "temporary" rate last? And at what cost to #Taiwan's industries? https://t.co/J4t4dsRA1S

An 8.8 magnitude #earthquake occurred in the #KamchatkaPeninsula, Russia. This may cause a #tsunami in the coastal areas of #NewTaipeiCity. 

According to the #CentralWeatherAdministration, the ETA to #Taiwan is around 1:40 PM today, July 30, 2025. Please be careful and prepared. https://t.co/Dlo7EnrRRo

We may differ in our views, but we are not enemies. We care deeply about this land we call home.

Let's not erase diverse voices, but forge harmony. It‚Äôs the beauty of our freedom, our democracy & our everyday lives.

Let's bring politics back to reason & people back to living. https://t.co/waMvrhICt3

NO to political struggle.
NO to political purge.
#Vote #NO to reject the mass #recall campaign on Saturday, July 26, 2025! https://t.co/Umn6FEl3zh

The 2025 Urban Resilience Air Raid Drills in #NewTaipeiCity will take place from 1:30 PM to 2:00 PM on Thursday, July 17, 2025. 

When hearing sirens or receiving warning messages, please follow the instructions of the police & duty officers and proceed to the nearest shelters. https://t.co/HgsGbgM1NO

People matter! #NewTaipeiCity wasn't severely damaged by #TyphoonDanas, but Tainan & Chiayi were. Staff from @NewTaipeiGov's public works, agriculture, and environmental protection depts have been dispatched to assist those affected in #Tainan & #Chiayi. Thanks for their service. https://t.co/stW1R1efyN

World-renowned @Uber & @NewTaipeiGov are exploring potential collaborations in rural areas & holiday services at popular tourist destinations in #NewTaipeiCity. I welcomed Andrew Byrne, Uber's VP of Global Public Policy, and his team for their visit on future possibilities. https://t.co/13yY50CDjg

Earlier in June, I welcomed the delegation from Taiwan Benevolent Association of California which offers significant support to Taiwanese compatriots living in Southern California. Many of them are originally from #NewTaipeiCity. I hope they'll visit their hometown more often. https://t.co/oTp9qB2Zgb

Happy Police Day!

I salute our hardworking and diligent law enforcement officers, as I used to be one myself. 

Our citizens are very grateful for your contributions and service in keeping us all safe. https://t.co/iyFcIqrGbl

I'm also grateful to @KP_Taiwan, @WananChiang, and all the staff for making it a successful opening ceremony.

Let's show #Taiwan's hospitality! https://t.co/ajZ6Fhihbw
